name: TheThoughtReader
0:
”Alexa ask the thought reader to name my card”
”Alexa ask Chris Kelly to name my card”
”Can you name my card?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the thought reader
des:
Impress everyone you know by letting them pick a card, any card, and listen as the mind reader manages to read that thought from their mind! Every statement they make is correct!

It's just like real magic. But, if you can't discover the trick, maybe https://www.alakazam.co.uk/the-alexa-trick-by-steven-goodwin.html can help!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
